attributes.action: NHS Walk-In medical centre for Ramsgate, Kent
attributes.additional_details: This petition will seek support from Thanet District Council and local MPs before presenting it to the government
attributes.background: A walk-in medical centre is needed in Ramsgate and the surrounding area. It will take pressure off doctor surgeries and hospital emergency services. This medical centre will be a great asset and of great benefit to Ramsgate and Thanet

rejection.details:
The decision to open a walk in medical centre in Ramsgate is one for the Thanet Clinical Commissioning Group, not the UK Government. You can find out how to contact them here: http://www.thanetccg.nhs.uk/contact-us/ 

You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government to make the availability of walk in medical centres mandatory across England or to provide special funding for a walk in medical centre in Ramsgate.
